summary: July 1 is the 182nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
July 1 is the 182nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar. There are 183 days remaining until the end of the year.
The end of this day marks the halfway point of a leap year. It also falls on the same day of the week as New Year's Day in a leap year.
title: 1 July
